data.title: THE RED BADGE OF COURAGE : An Episode of the American Civil War
data.meta_description: New York: Modern Library / Random House, 1951. Modern Library Edition. Hardcover. Item #99115 Very Good+ in a Very Good+ dust jacket. Toning to pages. Scuffing and toning to front and rear panels. Corners clipped to upper and lower portions of both flaps. Edge wear. ; 16mo 6 - 7 tall.
data.text:
New York: Modern Library / Random House, 1951. Modern Library Edition. Hardcover. Item #99115

Very Good+ in a Very Good+ dust jacket. Toning to pages. Scuffing and toning to front and rear panels. Corners clipped to upper and lower portions of both flaps. Edge wear. ; 16mo 6" - 7" tall.
